name: Alien Sabotage!
description:
You're on a "mineral extraction expedition" when an alien begins sabotaging your ship, how long can you survive with dwindling control?

Controls:

Q: Basic Attack

W: Strong Attack, takes more power

E: Shield, Quickly drains power

R: Boosters, Slowly drains power

Arrow Keys: Move

ESC: Quit Game

Space*: Activates the Spazer, which stuns the alien, halting sabotage.

    *Warning, fries the battery, you'll need to replace it if you want to keep using abilities

Left Click** : repair sabotaged systems, grab batteries, and fix the wheel 

    **Beware, fixing sabotage requires you to take your hand off the wheel, you can't move the ship while fixing things!
